Contributor: Knickerbocker, E. H., artist.; Victory Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "E.H. Knickerbocker." Date based on the date of Victory Liberty Loan Campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that the bridge of victory is now completed, the war is won, but the cost of winning must be met. It will only be a decisive victory when every cent of the debt is paid. Illustration depicts Victory as a bridge with the 5 Liberty Loans as  columns that support the structure. Design for a newspaper advertisement for the Victory Liberty Loan Campaign.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
